title: Question 87:
description: The fee to claim is more expensive than my staking reward is worth. What can I do?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
The high fees are a consequence of high gas fees on the Ethereum network due to increased demand. 

Solutions that are live or under development:

1. #xsnx 
2. #layer-2
3. [yEarn](https://yearn.finance/) ySNX Vault
4. [Debt Pool Snapshots](https://sips.synthetix.io/sips/sip-83)

Tips for saving money on gas fees:

1. Claim on the weekends.
2. Set Gas Price alerts with the @FAQ bot.
3. Loan your SNX on [Aave](https://aave.com/) in lieu of staking.
